name: Hardys Zero Chardonnay
ingredients: De-Alcoholised Wine (93%) (Chardonnay Grapes (87%), other Grapes (13%)) (SULPHITES, MILK, EGG), Grape Concentrate (SULPHITES), Sugar, Natural Flavourings, Acid (Citric Acid), Preservatives (E220 (SULPHITES), E242), Carbon Dioxide
allergens: Ei, Vis, Aardnoten (pinda's), Melk, Zwaveldioxide en sulfieten
